Conditionals and Loops¶

The if statement¶

var food = "pizza"
if food == "pizza":
  print("Yammi!")
end

The if else statement¶

var food = "sushi"
if food == "hamburguer":
  print("Tasty!")
else:
  print("Meeeh")
end

Chained conditionals¶

var x = 0
if x < 0:
  print("You need more!")
elif x > 0:
  print("You need less!")
else:
  print("Correct!")
end

Nested conditionals¶

var x = 1
if x < 0:
  if x < 10:
    print("It is a positive single digit.")
  end
end

For Loops¶

The for loop will iterate from one number to another or a list. It will go one by one by default, but you can specify the jump value.

  • For Loop with Step 1

for i=0 to 10:
  print(i)
end

or

for i in range(0, 10):
  print(i)
end

  • For Loop with Step 2

for i=0 to 10 step 2:
  print(i)
end

  • For Loop over a List

for i in ['Iron Man', 'Spiderman', 'Black Widow']:
  print(i)
end

While Loop¶

The while loop will loop while the condition is met.

var x = 0
while x < 10:
  print(i)
  var i = i + 1
end
